thread.title: Malala meets Pakistani Prime Minister Shahid Khaqan Abbasi

title: Malala meets Pakistani Prime Minister Shahid Khaqan Abbasi
text:
Malala meets Pakistani Prime Minister Shahid Khaqan Abbasi 9:57am BST - 00:45 
The Nobel laureate and education activist returned to her native Pakistan, six years after she was shot by Taliban gunmen over her advocacy for schooling for girls. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
